snippet: The web portal said a trove of documents stolen by hackers is “newsworthy” because it shows “the inner workings of an influential multinational corporation.”
abstract: Sony condemns WikiLeaks for releasing searchable archive of emails and other documents that were stolen from the studio by hackers in 2014; web portal defends publication, saying it is amounts to legitimate news by revealing internal workings of an influential multinational corporation.
lead_paragraph: The web portal said a trove of documents stolen by hackers is “newsworthy” because it shows “the inner workings of an influential multinational corporation.”

headline.main: WikiLeaks Posts Sony Pictures Documents, Angering the Studio
